short_summary: Replacement of visual aids and other work related located at Kuujjuaq Airport
description: Direct link to RFP: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14886045 All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on January 19,2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing this Request for proposal (RFP) for replacement of visual aids and other work related located at Kuujjuaq Airport as detailed in Technical specifications. Important: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number EF997-221993/A dated April 6, 2022 with a closing of May 27, 2022 at 2:00pm EDT.
